code: import classNames from"classnames";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Roles=/*#__PURE__*/function(Roles){Roles["ANIMATION"]="Animation";Roles["DESIGN"]="Design";Roles["PROGRAMMING"]="Programming";Roles["TECH_ART"]="Tech Art";Roles["UI_UX"]="UI/UX";return Roles;}(Roles||{});const pillBadgeStyles=role=>classNames('mx-1 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-md',{"bg-[#d15a64]":role===Roles.ANIMATION,"bg-[#5a84d1]":role===Roles.DESIGN,"bg-[#5dbf4e]":role===Roles.PROGRAMMING,"bg-[#d1905a]":role===Roles.TECH_ART,"bg-[#5abfd1]":role===Roles.UI_UX});export const RoleBadge=_ref=>{let{role}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:pillBadgeStyles(role),children:role});};
